title: Search for Oakley Stretch Logo Font
content:
Hello!

I search for the (old) and very cool Oakley Stretch Logo Font. This Logo Has the old very streched "O" above and in the bottom the brand name oakley. Very spacy or future design! What is this for a font? Can we help me?

Thanks

kos
author: kos

comments.content:
That thread's about the current logo. I think kos is referring to [this one](http://web.archive.org/web/20150129054731/http:/www.logotypes.ru/gif.get?gif=Oakley%5Flogo2), which looks to be based on [the previous one](http://web.archive.org/web/20150129054731/http:/www.logotypes.ru/gif.get?gif=Oakley%5Flogo).

Edit: those links should work if you paste them into a new browser.

Certainly custom. There's just too much interlocking for this to be a font.

_just to be sure, you're asking about [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20150129054731/http:/yellowsnowmn.tripod.com/sitebuildercontent/sitebuilderpictures/oakley_logo.gif) logo, correct?_
